posts.post_content:
It'd be great if WOTC made me happier more often.   
This needed to be a rare. Even at uncommon too many of these floating around in a draft would be too busted. If someone got this opening hand they might just handidly win the game. This is in the same set now with Strip Mine. Its a draft thing. Otherwise it would be an uncommon or even common like it was originally. I hope someday MTGO gets to be on PS3. PC is not enough of a spotlight for this game its too hardcore. It belongs with my living room couch
posts.html:

Posted By: Hovercraft (11/24/2010 11:11:21 PM)
Rating:

Agreed, uncommon would have been fine for this and Regrowth. But money is money. And Wizards likes money.
@Hovercraft; I disagree. Uncommon is perfect for this in draft, while rare is perfect for Strip mine. It is difficult to run a single color, like monoblack, for a draft and make a good deck. It helps that a lot of nonrare bombs in this set are colorless, but that doesn't help you if you decide to draft Terror. Since you may need to include red in your deck for Primitive Justice or white in your deck for Divine offering, doubleblack won't often enough show up on your second turn to make it profitable. Stone Rain is great at common in draft formats that want to encourage players to draft only one or two colors, but hasn't been reprinted in a while because wizards simply doesn't want to.
It is very difficult to create a prison with cards that you draft. Sinkhole at common could do that, so it can't be common in this set, but uncommon would be fair, as you would, on average, only be ab... (see all)
